constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 195 (Friday, November 5, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
Mr. ISSA:
H.R. 5909
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I Section 8 Clause 18 of the Constitution
[Page H6236]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

title: To authorize the President to award the Medal of Honor to E. Royce Williams for acts of valor during the Korean War.
